tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HighThroughputScreeningResults (
    screening_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    compound_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    compound_structure TEXT,
    screening_date DATE,
    screening_result BOOLEAN,
    assay_type VARCHAR(100),
    target_protein VARCHAR(100),
    assay_measurement FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DrugDiscoveryResults (
    discovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    screening_id INT,
    compound_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_protein VARCHAR(255),
    discovery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE high_throughput_results (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    compound_id INT,
    assay_id INT,
    result FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (experiment_id, compound_id, assay_id)
)

CREATE TABLE compounds (
    compound_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    compound_name VARCHAR(255),
    formula VARCHAR(50),
    molecular_weight FLOAT,
    structure BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE assays (
    assay_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assay_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_protein VARCHAR(255),
    assay_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE High_Throughput_Screening (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	compound_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	compound_structure TEXT NOT NULL,
	target_protein VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	screening_result DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);
